name: Blimp
description:
You control an alien ball called Blimp.
Launch Blimp and connect it to the energy rings on each level.

Use LMB to launch. Press R to restart. Press Esc to select levels.

Note: the web-version works better on Firefox and Chrome, and progress is not saved with it. For the full experience, check the downloads below!

Made with love for Godot Wild Jam 21, by:
@inacho_ (Game Design, Development and Art)
@kbooz (Game Design, Development)
@Ornelas45 (Music & SFX)
